thread.title: BRIEF-nVent Electric Says Director Brian Baldwin Reports Open Market Purchase Of Common Shares

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-nVent Electric Says Director Brian Baldwin Reports Open Market Purchase Of Common Shares
text:
May 14 (Reuters) - nVent Electric PLC:
* NVENT ELECTRIC SAYS DIRECTOR BRIAN BALDWIN REPORTS OPEN MARKET PURCHASE OF 361,793 COMMON SHARES AT AVERAGE PRICE OF $24.87PER SHARE ON MAY 10 - SEC FILING
* NVENT ELECTRIC SAYS DIRECTOR BRIAN BALDWIN REPORTS OPEN MARKET PURCHASE OF 7,500 COMMON SHARES AT AVERAGE PRICE OF $25.62PER SHARE ON MAY 11 Source text: ( bit.ly/2IjaeXn ) Further company coverage:
